comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: This is not in the formatter.  In the formatter, the `MyString` output has `Hidden` as a typename so it's deliberately hidden.  Not sure where that is being set.  In the parser, I can see that only `$Param` has the hidden attribute.  cc @rjmholt

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: We could try compiled artifacts to find a PR where the regression come but GitHub removes old ones.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: This is a regression caused by the `FirstOrDefault` primitive added early in PS7 preview.
